name: 10 Mania
description:
10 Mania challenges you to formulate a sum divisible by 10 in order to gain points. The gameplay requires you to choose from the moving bubbles of numbers of 1-9. Tap and drag your chosen numbers to the formula tray and tap calculate to create the 10 Mania. Create a higher sum or select numbers with the same color to earn higher points.

Check out more features of 10 Mania:

- 5 different game mode challenge to choose from
- Accumulate score to earn different titles
- Compete with friends and have the highest score in the Leaderboard
- Enter Fever mode to earn more points
